apis.name: List all deploy keys
apis.description: Get a list of all deploy keys across all projects of the GitLab instance. This endpoint requires administrator access and is not available on GitLab.com.

attributes.name: public
attributes.description: Only return deploy keys that are public. Defaults to false.

apis.name: List deploy keys for project
apis.description: Get a list of a project’s deploy keys.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

apis.name: List project deploy keys for user
apis.description: Get a list of a specified user (requestee) and the authenticated user’s (requester) common project deploy keys. It lists only the enabled project keys from the common projects of requester and requestee.

attributes.name: id_or_username
attributes.description: The ID or username of the user to get the project deploy keys for.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: key_id
attributes.description: The ID of the deploy key

apis.name: Add deploy key
apis.description: Creates a new deploy key for a project.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: can_push
attributes.description: Can deploy key push to the project’s repository

apis.name: Update deploy key
apis.description: Updates a deploy key for a project.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: can_push
attributes.description: Can deploy key push to the project’s repository

apis.name: Delete deploy key
apis.description: Removes a deploy key from the project. If the deploy key is used only for this project, it’s deleted from the system.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: key_id
attributes.description: The ID of the deploy key

apis.name: Enable a deploy key
apis.description: Enables a deploy key for a project so this can be used. Returns the enabled key, with a status code 201 when successful.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: key_id
attributes.description: The ID of the deploy key
